metadata.name: Vortex Founder's Pack
metadata.description: Founder Packs are one-of-a-kind Vortex Packs created as a means of fundraising to cover the initial expenses of Vortex Labs. Buying a Founders Pack supports us in delivering the Vortex Client to a mass audience. These packs can be opened during Season One, revealing a guaranteed Vortex Avatar along with four traits, one of which is a guaranteed rare.
